info.title: OSoMe - Observatory on Social Media
info.description: OSoMe (pronouced awe•some) allows you to submit queries to our massive social media database. Given a set of Twitter hashtags and a time period, we can count the number of matching tweets, generate a time series, count the number of tweets from each user, or just list matching Tweet IDs. One can subsequently utilize Twitter's REST API to retrieve more information about tweets or users of interest.
